item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: Well Kristina did have a hand in helping me pick out the design. She is supposed to wear it forever after all, so she better like it!

item.title: By: Erin Lynch

item.description: Congrats on your recent engagement. That is great!
item.content:encoded: Congrats on your recent engagement. That is great!

item.title: By: The Mariano's
item.dc:creator: The Mariano's
item.description: Congratulations to the two of you. That was very romantic. Keep us posted on your plans. We'll be following your progress. Best wishes and God Bless you both. W/Love, Auntie Jo & Uncle Tony Mariano
item.content:encoded:
Congratulations to the two of you. That was very romantic. Keep us posted on your plans.
We’ll be following your progress. Best wishes and God Bless you both.
W/Love,
Auntie Jo & Uncle Tony Mariano

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich

item.description: I wish the ring came with a whistle or corkscrew or something utilitarian.

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich

item.description: Thanks Maricel. I just wanted Kristina to have something good to say for her high of the week at the next e-board meeting!

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: Yea, you have no idea how long she has been waiting. But it was totally worth it. Thanks for the warm regards!
item.content:encoded: Yea, you have no idea how long she has been waiting. But it was totally worth it. Thanks for the warm regards!
